FAQ / Wave 5 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Skullsmasher - Swamp Warrior

  1. Slipstream (alt mode) is attacking Skullsmasher (body mode). Does Slipstream pass a damage then take a damage, or does she take a damage and then pass a damage? [Source: Aequitas]
    Looking at the Expanded Rules, an attacker taps in 1.3.1.2, whereas an attacker's "when this attacks" trigger happens at 1.3.1.5. Therefore Skullsmasher triggers first, doing a damage to Slipstream, and then Slipstream moves a damage to the defender.
